After destroying his business and leaving home.
There's nowhere to put his whole body at ease.
He picked up a flute without a hole in it.
He blew it across Miluo Bay.
(Ruamyō).
"It's not the mind or property of the Buddha.
He's opened his mouth and already talked about falling into it.
How do you want to ask again?
Why don't you just spit in my face?'
(Killing six yanhui).
'It's not the mind, and it's not things.
The white-headed man has grown a black-headed falcon.
He tears open the front door and dismounts from the horse's dais.
His whole body is covered in cold sweat as black as ink.
(Peng'an Huai).

source_sentence: 南泉因黃蘗首座一日捧鉢於師位坐。
translation: One day, Nanquan asked the chief seat of the Huangzhao school to bring his bowl to the teacher's seat.
The master then asked.
"Elder, how long has he been on the path?
He said it was before Meghasvararāja Buddha.
The master said.
"I'm still the son and grandson of the king's teacher.
The stump then passed over to his original position.
He said in verse.
"Who remembers each other when they're old?
Each was strong and sympathetic before people.
A pit could not avoid burying them all.
How many of them now have blue eyes?'
(Longhorse).
The King of Vairocana Buddhas was his son and grandson.
At the time, the king's elder opened his mouth with great words.
Huang Chang saw the opportunity to discern a master and a companion.
The code of punishment has been established as a school for a thousand years.
(Lakṣmī Yamântaka).
[Continued] He clearly stirred up a vat of excrement.
Instead, it burned the musk in a charming way.
There's so much fragrance that I've never heard before.
He's sitting all by himself in a jar of excrement.
(Menganyue).
Nanquan brought his bowl into the hall.
"The guest and host are clearly distinguished, and they're willing to disagree on their own.
Don't discuss the precepts with Meghasvara.
There's originally no order of precedence that can be discriminated.
(Tianmu's salutation).
Huang Chang descended from his seat.
Nanquan took the upper seat.
Paper was expensive in Changzhou.
He led them all in one piece of paper.
(Bei na jian).
Huang Ye could give a plan to trap the tiger.
Why is Wang Lao's strategy so strange?
He asked about it with his tongue twisting back and forth.
He directly moved himself back to the old path.
(Jien Wengjing).

source_sentence: 禪宗頌古聯珠通集卷第十
translation: Chanzong chanson gu lianzhu tongji vol. 10
